alert.note: Alert for Clay; Ray (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 08 at 1:29AM CDT until June 08 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northeastern Clay County in west central Missouri... West central Ray County in west central Missouri... * Until 200 AM CDT. * At 129 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Kearney, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Liberty, Excelsior Springs, Kearney, Crystal Lakes, Excelsior Estates, Woods Heights, Rayville, Mosby, Homestead and Prathersville. This includes Interstate 35 in Missouri between mile markers 17 and 27. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: Tornadoes are extremely difficult to see and confirm at night. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW! This cluster of thunderstorms is capable of producing tornadoes and widespread significant wind damage. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
